LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We will likely encounter more powerful zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Thankfully, I have detected a new solution: Power Tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}If you use a Plant Food on a plant on a tile...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}All plants on the tiles of the same color will also receive a Plant Food.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}You may want to maximize the use of these tiles in order to win.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_10: {SAY:crazydave}Multiplying the number of Plant Food effects?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE13_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I hear music! Time to dance, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE13_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Are we to believe that the zombies may use the power of dance?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I used to hypnotize the old Dancing僵尸 back at night.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Then we could dance together with his crew while defeating the other zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Those were the good old days. Or nights.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared to relive the past, User Dave. Right here in the future.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Speaking of the old night, there's also Football僵尸 as well!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we'll see a version of him, somewhere around here?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. He was fun to watch football with!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Granted, he only spoke NO BRAINZ when hypnotized, but still!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies have developed a new technological invention to fight us, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}These runes will prevent us from planting ground plants on them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Not only that - once activated, they will shield all zombies on those tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to be careful around them - I fear that this shielding will be impossible to break through.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Think of the horror Penny - a shielded Shield僵尸! How will we even win?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}I'm afraid I don't have a good answer for this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I detect a massive shift in time, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Frozen Thyme Warps placed on our lawn seem to be the cause.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Thyme Warps will warp all zombies back to the start while restoring all their health.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Who cares? We have one final wave of zombies to bash!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}We'll need to keep an eye on Thyme Warp.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}His overwhelming power can be a game changer for our side.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}I strongly suspect he had already set up something ahead of us...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Ah well. We didn't get what we came for though. You know what to do, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_9: {SAY:crazydave}Then time to hit the time stream, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Isn't it convenient that your neighbor is so helpful in your fight against us zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Crazy David's apparent incompetence is only eclipsed by his usefulness.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}However, with one secret word my sleeper agent will turn against you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {PLAYFUL}Can I borrow your brains? Um, I mean hot sauce!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MAGNIFYING_GRASS_FAILUR: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Oops, you should give it another shot!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I spy with my crazy eye a U.F.B.! An unidentified flying brain!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Something more formidable than a brain lies within.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}I want to eat THAT hypno-taco again! I need my TIME MACHINE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {TIRED:crazydave}What? Wait a minute... what was I saying again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}It says there's an error. Can you come here and fix it Penny?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Did you try unplugging it and plugging it back in?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Woah! What's this? It's blocking our path!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}We may need to find another way to bypass this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Perhaps we can come back after we're done with other eras?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}We may use Travel Log for checkpoints in our adventure.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Brrrrr. It's colder than a polar bear eating an ice pop!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. It appears we have arrived in the Frostbite Caves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}We've traveled so far back in history ... we've arrived in PREhistory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}A historic moment indeed, User Dave. But more importantly...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:winnie}My sensors indicate there is an ice floe on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Data suggests it will block both plants and zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_7: {EXCITED:winnie}Though I predict hungry zombies will find a way around it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}Don't worry. We'll plant wisely and stop those zombies COLD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Don't look now, Penny, but those plants have a bad case of freezer burn!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}It's the freezing winds from this time period. They've immobilized the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}I suggest we call on Hot Potato. She can melt those ice blocks.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}I'm warming up to the idea already!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}Brrrr... w-w-w-we may be encountering s-s-s-snowstorms soon.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_3: {TIRED:winnie}I s-s-s-suspect that these zombies m-m-m-may use them to their adv... ACCCHEW!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Me Zomboss. Me write you another threatening note.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}You in trouble. Biiiiig trouble. Gargantuan trouble, in fact!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar smash! Smash your tiny, shivering plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar deliver prehistoric plague of Imps!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_6: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I postulate evolution will never come to that zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Not in a million, billion, gazillion years.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}These endangered plants are so far away... this is nigh-impossible!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE9_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}The solution might be more obscure than we thought.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I'm gettin' dizzy from all these zombie-moving sliders!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}And it will only g-g-get worse. We got company!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Do they come to buy my plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}They just won't take no brains for an answer!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}According to my data, Neanderthal zombie skulls are 33.2 percent harder than other zombie skulls.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Ah well. At least we survived. Let's get outta here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Brrr... I can never g-g-get used to the cold.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}Or why you seem to be fine in that attire.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}What I DO know... is that we have more zombies to defeat!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}Regardless of the cold... Or the cold comfort of victory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Would it b-b-be too far-fetched to say that only a lava floor can warm me up?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}Don't worry Penny! We have lots of fire plants from the conveyor this time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}No problem! Someone has to combat the cold for you!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_6: {TIRED:winnie}The Nether Dodos are a force to be reckoned with.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_7: {TIRED:winnie}They CANNOT be detected unless they fly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_8: {EXCITED:crazydave}Can we keep one and train her how to fly then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_9: {TIRED:winnie}No. We do need to find a way to force them to fly though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_10: {EXCITED:crazydave}Don't worry! I'm sure our neighbor can figure something out with these plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_11: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{TIRED:winnie}NO WAIT, WE DON'T HAVE ANY WARM...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_15: {TIRED:winnie}Try to find a way around the freezing wind, then.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}That won't work on me this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... seems like the c-c-cold's getting to me and my memory.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}But, your mold colonies have managed to create an interesting challenge this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}We don't want to hurt Moldies... but we need to plant on those lanes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That's a lot of ice right there.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}And now I scream for icecream, because only it will melt my frozen heart!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}Icy a lot more, t-t-too. Future zombies have arrived in the past.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_6: {特点2:crazydave}A technological advancement in Frostbite Caves? ABSURD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Zomboss blows up mines... Mines perish... Then you die!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}You heard that Penny! We have to protect them!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}Not because I want to know their secret lives!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}And it will just get worse from here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_3: {TIRED:winnie}The toughest challenges are far from over.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}For now we can leave this place. Go to somewhere warmer.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}Like Wild West... there's another energy spike from there.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}Another chance to finally face Dr. Zomboss? Well then, let's time travel!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED: winnie}User Dave, I've detected an incoming ice cube.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {SAY:winnie}Analysis suggests this creepy cube unlocks a chilly challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You know what I say? Brrrrr-ing it on!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{TIRED:crazydaveicon}Penny, hath you ever tried licking an ice-thickle and got your tongue thtuck to it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydaveicon}Uh ... me neither. Thath would be craaaazthy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_4: {SAY:winnieicon}Sigh. While your tongue heals, please note the strange stone tablet.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_5: {SAY:winnieicon}It appears to be a warning sign, written in Cave僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Doesth it warn people not to lick ice-thickles?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You are truly amazing! Most deserving of the name... Senor Pinata!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Have you seen my taco Senor Pinata? It was about this big...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}That's it. Please disrupt this anomaly before User Dave gets too attached.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}User Dave, this does not look like a party.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}It could still be a surprise party, with gifts and everything!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You'll see Penny, I think these zombies are different.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}There is an impending attack on your house in modern times!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}I bet it's not an attack... I bet it's a party! Oh, I hope it's a Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}It's not a party, there are zombies from all different time periods ready to strike!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Who knows what else they could have brought with them?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Sounds like a party to me! Better hurry up, we don't want to miss out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}The party is over for now, but those zombies will be back some day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}Defending against multiple parties in a row could lead to a massive pinata anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}I can't wait for the next Pinata Party, and the one after that!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}But those pinatas just remind me of my sad lost taco. Let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}Missing a Pinata Party will reset the build up to the massive pinata anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnieicon}I won't pretend to understand why, but the data does not lie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Just let us know of any more Pinata Parties you detect!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}For a party they can be pretty sneaky.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}What did I tell you Penny? A surprise Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}Does not compute. It appears a level 3 diagnostic check is in order.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Pinatas! Let's bust some open and see what we get!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The City at night... it is quite a sight.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}However, zombies are still here. They think that attacking at night is easier.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}The mystery of the temple must be protected from these shuffling adventurers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Well then, time to deliver a whooping butt kick to these undeads!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Sun is scarce as Gold Tiles haven't appeared.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to produce more to survive the night.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Are you sure it's not because The National Plant Organization asked us to do so?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}These sneaky undeads have found a new way to fight against us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... that would have been more realistic, but no.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They will try harder to steal our sun though - so be quick.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Those no-good sun stealing zombies! We'll show them who's the fastest!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}... we're not in the West, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Details, details! We got zombies to defeat, so who cares?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The hunt for the sun has begun.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we'll ever succeed in stopping Mr. Boss guy?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... it's strange that a time machine doesn't have answers to time-related questions, huh.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}But we're literally surfing in the time stream!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}And so peace has returned to the quiet jungle night.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Time to hop back to the space-time continuum.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}Cheer up, User Dave. Don't be so meta and gloomy like Gloom-shroom.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}User Dave, this is no ordinary jungle. A scan of my records indicates that this is the fabled Lost City.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Lost City? This is it Penny! We've found it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Where else would I find my lost pan, except in a Lost City?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Your continued fixation defies all logic or reason, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate movement incoming from above.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Maybe it's presents. Presents from the sky!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}The chances of that statement being true are statistically irrelevant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I believe it to be a new form of zombie threat. We should be cautious of unexpected guests.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}This will be the first Last Stand. There will be more lasts to come.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, my analysis shows that time is starting to bend itself.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}僵尸from the past and future may appear before or after their initial appearances.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We will have to be more careful from here on out.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We are gonna have a tough battle ahead.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Not only do we have few choices, but we're limited in the number of plants as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Our micro managing will have to be good.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}The shovel will be your best friend.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}React quickly against fast zombies, and we'll get through this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Historical texts state that the Sun was worshipped here. Resources should be plentiful.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I suggest that we try planting on the Gold Tiles that we find here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}They should continuously generate sun as long as they have plants on them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Sorry to crash your expedition, Adventurers of the Lost Temple...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}But unfortunately for you, the Porter Gargantuars are about to ruin your day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_6: {SAY:zombossicon}Prepare to submit your brain, and become ancient history.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}We'll chase him later - giant problems are incoming!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Gold concentration seems to be much higher today.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Gold Tiles will spawn from time to time, if they can spawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}We're gonna be rich!... but why do they spawn?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}The jungle holds many secrets, User Dave. It's best that we don't question it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}You may find that certain details about plants and zombies that you missed.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY9_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... just in case you're from the vanilla timeline.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}The Temple is secured for now, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Lost City will remain intact. No zombies will dare try to discover it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Time for the next era! What will it be?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Back to the jungle! Looking as lost as ever!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Be careful of the stronger adventuring zombies, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}THEY should be careful of the plants instead!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}After all, exploring the jungle can be dangerous!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Do you think I can convey my thoughts to Mr. Boss guy?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I somehow doubt that, User Dave. For now, we have a conveyor challenge ahead.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Good enough for me! I'll just send my notes on this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Sadly, we can't. Hopefully we can configure this conveyor to be two ways, one day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}For now, we'll just have to settle with plants delivered towards us from the unknown.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ouchie! The jungle sure has a lot of bugs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I have detected the presence of some unique trap tiles on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}When triggered by a plant or a zombie, a swarm of bugs will appear to bite both!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}You'll probably need some strong defensive plants to protect other plants from the bugs...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Or, alternatively, find certain plants that won't trigger the traps, like Iceberg Lettuce and Stunion.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Where's bug spray when you need it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}The ground's trembling! Can you feel it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Oh no... I fear that one of the temples has been busted open!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Now the zombie can use its power to embiggen themselves to MONSTROUS SIZE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... yeah... don't remind me of the nightmare back home.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}I smell jungles! And more buzzing sounds!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY19_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Something is hidden here... Keep an eye out for anything out of place.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}You seem to have struck gold with these newly found Gold Tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}But my zombies shall crush you and claim what are rightfully ours: Your brain, and the secret of the temple.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Seems like a huge siege is coming towards us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}We'll make use of these Tiles and stop them in their track!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}The temple has been salvaged once more, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We may need to go back to the Dark Ages now... my sensors feel a disturbance.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY21_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ah, back to the City of the Lost!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY21_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Be wary though User Dave, as we will encounter far stronger zombie hordes this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY21_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}But our plant group has also expanded as well! Time to take them head on!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}My sensors detected that Sun Focant has made a return.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we should keep an eye on them, lest they snatch our sun away.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Forget about that! I forgot how many bugs there are in this jungle!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Come on then, I will help you look for your bug spray. Again.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Hey, look at that Penny! Some mimes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}It's good to find entertainment in the middle of nowhere, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Be cautious, User Dave. These Mime僵尸are no ordinary mimes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}If left alone long enough, they will destroy the leftmost plants on their lanes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}However, they seem to enjoy eating plants from a distance as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}They may be distracted and unable to attack while eating, so we should take advantage of that.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}We should do that by getting a front row seat to their shows! For free!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Bugs, bugs and more bugs! Have you found my bug spray yet?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Not yet, User Dave, but I think we have more pressing matters.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I detected that these Bugs might be imposters, mimicking as regular Bug僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They may drop some unexpected surprises, so watch out.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}No, User Dave. No Imps are involved, I believe.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY28_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}These Mimes seem to be everywhere, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY28_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Today they seem to have chosen the trapped in a box act!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY28_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Well, a giant icecube is like a cold box, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}It is time to enact my second big attack.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}How do you like my newest performers? Have their shows been entertaining and deadly?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Surely, you will also enjoy a final show from my improved Mimes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}I sincerely hope it will be a show to die for. Literally!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_7: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}More Mimes! And they are preparing something big for us to watch, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}Yes. We may need all our knowledge to best these Mimes in their own game.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}I have successfully disabled the recharge nerf for this battle only, at least.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_10: {特点2:crazydave}To out-mime a mime? Sounds CRAZYYYYY! Let's do it then!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}That's the last of the zombie attack here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}May the temples be restful once more, and may we never see another mime again.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Aw, but I have been enjoying their acts!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}And I don't. Plus, we have Dark Ages to defend as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Well then, as they say, au revoir!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate this amulet points the way to a long-lost challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Well lookie-here, Penny! It's a treasure map!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {SAY:winnie}My analysis suggests that the origins of that map are highly suspect.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydave}It has a big red X on it, Penny. When have big red Xs ever been bad?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Facebreaker is a blast from the past, right to your face!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}In that case, it must be right to your vase!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}In order to battle against zombies better, we'll need to train our mind.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_2: {SAY}I have crafted a set of puzzles in order to hone your skills.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_3: {SAY}You need to place Primal Mines carefully in order to defeat the zombies on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_4: {SAY}A Conehead takes 2 Mines to kill. A Buckethead takes 3.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_5: {SAY}You can also only plant at most 2 mines per lane.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_6: {SAY}Once you're done planting, wait for a bit before starting the battle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_7: {SAY}Some helpful zombies will trigger the mines for you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_8: {SAY}If you can't kill all the zombies, you can restart the puzzle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_9: {SAY}There are 8 challenges - try to beat them all in a row. Good luck.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}If you need a refresher on how this works...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_2: {SAY}You need to place Primal Mines carefully in order to defeat the zombies on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_3: {SAY}A Conehead takes 2 Mines to kill. A Buckethead takes 3.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_4: {SAY}You can also only plant at most 2 mines per lane.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_5: {SAY}Once you're done planting, wait for a bit before starting the battle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_6: {SAY}Some helpful zombies will trigger the mines for you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_7: {SAY}If you can't kill all the zombies, you can restart the puzzle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN0_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This seems to be its own pocket dimension...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN0_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I suspect that new challenges await us in front of this area.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN0_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}These battles will surely be unlike any of the others we have faced so far.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COMMUNITY_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This seems to be its own pocket dimension...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COMMUNITY_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}It's probably the machination of other time travellers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COMMUNITY_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}So... in Crazy Dave's tongue... Community Levels?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Penny! A random length of sewer pipe!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Be careful, User Dave. That pipe is part of a municipal mulch of endless engagement!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}It may look like the end of the road...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_2: {SAY:crazydaveicon}But the road goes on when searching for a taco on the space-time continuum.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}In the meantime, be sure to practice advanced planting techniques in the Endless Zones.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Penny is right. It's important to stay sharp.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_5: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}You never know when you might find zombies on your lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_9: {SAY:crazydaveicon}But if you do find my pot on your lawn...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_10: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Could you put it in the pantry?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}Pirates. Why does it have to be Pirates?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE1_INTRO_2: {SHOUT:crazydave}But Pirates! Hang on to your parrots and peg legs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Arrr matey! Seems like these zombies have some skills!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Correct, User Dave. These swashbucklers can appear in groups.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... they are just decorations. Otherwise we would have shot down the other ship.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE4_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They are zombies. They don't feel much.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE8_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Be advised that your sailing vessel is of insufficient size.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}Maybe they want to invite us on their ship?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Quite the opposite, User Dave. We should prepare ourselves for the mightiest pirate onslaught so far.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}You may need to start using more expensive plants, as cheap plant defense may not be able to last long.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Practice with this Melon-pult against this heavy onslaught.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY}I'm ready to go. Pirates are great, but I think I'm getting homesick.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}No time for that. We have a Mr. Boss guy to meet!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I see more seas! Arrrr there more zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}More pirate zombies have appeared, and with greater strength.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}We arrr gonna make them walk the planks! Then we claim the sea! Again!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Yo ho, yo ho, a pirate's life for me!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We'll never know what to expect from the zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Oh but I know what they can expect from me!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}The best pirate of the seas! Yar har!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE18_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We might need to find a way to solve this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE18_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Raid for the sun, then! Just like how these pirates do their raiding!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Well, whatever it is, we have another black flag coming in!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}You have once again escaped from another one of my traps.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Be advised that unless you submit your brain to us, we'll have no choice but to ramp up our army.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}The sea is ours to sail! Yarr har har!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss has escaped our captivity once again. No sign of him on the zombies' boat.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}But, I do find another energy spike in Frostbite Caves. It may be worth looking into.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Finally, one of these pirates dropped some booty!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I'm detecting something more challenging than treasure inside.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{特点11}Shiver me timbers. I've always wanted to do some swashbuckling!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL}And I've always wanted a poop deck of my own.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Yes, let's go. I'd hate for him to improvise a poop deck here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}To treasure! It says no zombies. Maps don't lie!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_INITIAL_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}You have some Power Ups! I'll show you how to use them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_INITIAL_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{特点6:crazydave}Yeah, and now we can break the seal. Let's get crazy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_REPEAT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You can try out your Power Ups for free here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}I have constructed a Training Zone for you to practice.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_2: {SAY}In order to unlock it, you have to follow my instruction.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_3: {SAY}After this empty level, the endless zone for Lost City will be opened.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_4: {SAY}You must pick a plant card and proceed to play normally by picking plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_5: {SAY}The endless zone will instantly kill you, however.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_6: {SAY}Once you die, return to the map selection screen. Then the Training Zone will be opened.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}What's that, Travel Log? You provide guidance, progress and rewards?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}The Log is not, in fact, speaking, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_LOG_AWARD_SCREEN_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Visit the Travel Log to claim your quest reward.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_EGYPT_PINATA_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}We'll need this one single seed packet to start tiering Peashooter properly. Buy it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_MORE_GEMS_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Check the Twiddydinkies often for new costumes! They come out once you earn a new plant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_STORE_OPEN_PINATAS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}Want some new stuff? Check out my Twiddydinkies! I sell cool plants and costumes in there!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_3: {BRINGOUT_TACO}{SAY}{LONG}I've been holding onto this taco for forever!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}Thank you neighbor! Hey, I found a note!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_7: {SAY:zombossicon}Your action of killing my zombies has angered me greatly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_8: {SAY:zombossicon}Therefore, I have polluted the timeline with my zombie horde.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_9: {SAY:zombossicon}I'll soon be collecting your brain with my timely army.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_10: {SAY:zombossicon}Submit your brain, or face the consequences. This is your last warning.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_12: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{SAY:crazydave}Cool! Mr. Boss guy wants us to travel through time with him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_13: {SAY:crazydave}We're going to need my time machine!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_14: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Her name is Penny and I'm Crazy Dave. But you can call me Crazy Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_15: {SAY:winnie}Finally, another User who can process my queries.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL4_OUTRO_16: {TIRED:winnie}Let me postulate, we will need to travel through time to defeat Zomboss and his army... again...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Hmm... I have detected certain powerful rifts in the timeline...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL5_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}In these rifts, the zombie attacks are much tougher than the usual ones.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL5_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}But defeating these massive hordes may rescue powerful and 特点 plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL5_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}There will be more rifts like these in the future, so keep an eye out for them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL5_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}You'll never know where they come up next.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}From now on, these rifts can be reaccessed by looking at the travel log.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}So, remember that these battles are purely optional.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}As such, you should not try too hard.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We can retreat from these attacks if they prove to be too difficult...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... and return once we have more plants at our disposal.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Or when you have gotten better at defending our lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}A minor reminder is that some Travel Log tabs are limited to 6 quests only.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TUTORIAL6_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}Try to beat the existing quests first to open more on said tabs.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Good news! Penny found a map across space time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}To be precise this is a space-time map where we can find plants that can help us and...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_UNIVERSE_INTRO_TUTORIAL_3: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Less explaining, more exploring! And kicking some zombies' butts!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}A lawn of vases is like a box of chocolates.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Some are awesome! Others taste downright ugly!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}But all vases are much harder on your teeth!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be careful with HOW you break vases.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:winnie}All green vases will contain plants. All brown vases will contain NOT plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_6: {EXCITED:winnie}You might want to break everything first, to know what are in those vases.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_7: {EXCITED:winnie}Then, you can start planning after a restart.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_8: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}I still miss my Vasebreaking buddy though...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-1_INTRO_9: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Think he's around in the time stream?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-2_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}Make good use of every plant given to you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-2_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:winnie}There may be more than one way to deal with a problem, after all.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}So, try! Experiment! E特点ly with HOW you break vases.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-2_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Sometimes you want to break all plant vases first. Sometimes, not so much.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-2_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Sometimes, you want to target all lanes at once. Sometimes, one lane at a time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies aren't really subtle this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-3_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}You may plan accordingly around the Gargantuar vases as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-3_OUTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Now off we go. To the time stream!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_0-3_OUTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}We're gonna break some vases and save some days!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_2-2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}特点 Gold Tiles are deployed for this level only.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_2-2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Planting on them will give you 150 sun, but they won't generate any more sun.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_5-3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I have some extra notes for this round of Vasebreaker.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_5-3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}You will need to destroy all the iceblocks to succeed.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_5-3_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Vases can block Troglobites from pushing iceblocks onward, however.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_8-2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}When a zombie is pushed to the outtermost column, 1500 damage will be dealt to it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_8-2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}This only activates for ONE zombie per lane though. Plan accordingly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_10-1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! Is it time for another dance party?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_10-1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Yes, User Dave. It seems that jams will still be available for these Vasebreakers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_10-1_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}In this one, there are hidden traps that stun the zombies once underneath the vases.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_VASEBREAKER_10-1_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}Are they stunned by our dancing prowess?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_YETI_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{PLAYFUL}My Penny sense has detected a rare and curious lunch box.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_YETI_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{PLAYFUL}I smell a Yeti! Let's go after him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_SPEE: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}Use your gems to speed up the progress.
{PLAYFUL:winnie}This will be the ONLY boost you can get from the garden.
{PLAYFUL:winnie}At the start of the battle, you can boost plants for gems. But that's it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_WELC: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}Zen Garden is just for growing plants for coins.
{EXCITED:winnie}But I can't really skip the boost growing tutorial from the timeline so...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_S: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}If you wait a while, your Marigold will grow.
{PLAYFUL:winnie}But you can speed up the process with Gems!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_W: {SAY:crazydave}If you water it, it will grow into a Marigold!
{EXCITED:crazydave}In any case, you'll get some coins after the plant fully grows!
{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Zen Garden is now officially open! Grow me a green thumb, neighbor!
LocStringValues.NIGHTSHADE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}regrows leaves when powered, but can't attack
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can't be eaten
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}For Nightshade, stabbing is a duty and a privilege. He comes from a long line of ardent stabbers, and his family counts three kings, four ambassadors and a president as among those proudly stabbed around.
LocStringValues.NIGHTSHADE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Nightshades are shadow plants that stab zombies when unpowered.
LocStringValues.NIGHTSHADE_TOOLTIP: Stabs zombies; regrows leaves when powered
LocStringValues.NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL_QUESTS_DESCRIPTION: Turn on Travel Log Quest notifications
LocStringValues.NOT_ENOUGH_SPROUTS: No more sprouts. Play levels to find more!
LocStringValues.OFFLINE_FACEBOOK_LOGIN_BODY: Please connect to a network in order to log in to Facebook.
LocStringValues.OUT_OF_CONTENT_HEADER: You need to download assets for this level.
LocStringValues.PACKET_LAST_STAND_LOCKED: This plant cannot be planted during Last Stand setup.
LocStringValues.PARSNIP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}cannot attack zombies too close to him
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Being a crab means he doesn't have much to do most of the time. Sure, he enjoys loafing around the beach and burying himself under the sand, but with his giant claws for hands, he can't really do much without tearing everything into pieces. Still, he tried, and while making a scrapbook for him and his friends seems impossible without him snipping every image, he's glad that he finally found a hobby he can enjoy.
LocStringValues.PARSNIP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Parsnips snip at zombies, then charge down the lane at the last moment.
LocStringValues.PARSNIP_TOOLTIP: Snips zombies, charges down lane when defeated
LocStringValues.PATCH_VERIFICATION_FAILED: Downloaded content may have been corrupted. Updated content will need to be downloaded again.
LocStringValues.PEANUT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Peanut knows that some folks have an aversion to him. He tries to be sensitive to their concerns and give them the space they need. Still, he can't help but miss the good old days - back when he was the most popular nut around.
LocStringValues.PEANUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Peanuts block zombies and shoot peanuts flying at random angle.
LocStringValues.PEANUT_TOOLTIP: Blocks zombies and shoots peanuts flying at random angle
LocStringValues.PEAPOD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Having studied Quantum Spatial Mechanics in Clown College, Pea Pod has been amusing families of all ages.
LocStringValues.PEAPOD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pea Pods can be planted in the same space for up to 5 times the destruction.
LocStringValues.PEAPOD_TOOLTIP: Is a Peashooter that can be planted on the same spot up to 5 times
LocStringValues.PEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}What is it like being famous? asked the Peashooter while sipping his bottled water, I can't talk right now, I'm finishing my merchandising deal. Hold my fir coat.
LocStringValues.PEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.
LocStringValues.PEPPERMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pepper-mint likes heat. He's down with flames, he digs on fire, he's a total madman for oxidization and ignition. If he sees you rubbing two sticks together, he'll come over and ask about it. He can't help himself.
LocStringValues.PEPPERMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pepper-mints set off lane-wide bursts of flame when planted and provide a temporary boost to all Pepper-mint Family plants on the lawn.
LocStringValues.PEPPERPULT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物

{FLAVOR}Some say Pepper-pult is a hot head. Some find his fiery disposition off-putting. But the truth is, he's just very focused and determined. He loves what he does. He appreciates everything he has. I came from the weedy side of the lawn, Pepper-pult explains. I worked hard to pull myself up by my roots. I'm a self-made pepper and I don't take a single thing for granted.
LocStringValues.PEPPERPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pepper-pults lob flaming peppers at zombies and keep nearby plants warm.
LocStringValues.PEPPERPULT_TOOLTIP: Lobs flaming peppers at zombies and 温暖周围的植物
LocStringValues.PERFUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Perfume-shrooms emit a pure, concentrated mist of aerosolized love.
LocStringValues.PERFUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Perfume-shrooms instantly enchant all dinosaurs in a lane, charming them into working against the zombies.
LocStringValues.PERM_LAWN_MOWER_TUTORIAL_2: Save your brains and gas up another!
LocStringValues.PHATBEET_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Phat Beet has been known to drop sick rhymes, dope grooves, and highly satisfactory jams, often within seconds of each other.
LocStringValues.PHATBEET_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Phat Beets thump out damage every second.
LocStringValues.PIRATE_LEVEL_NAME: 海盗港湾 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.PLANT_FOOD_TUTORIAL_1: Drag the Plant Food onto the plant
LocStringValues.PLANT_FOOD_TUTORIAL_2: Use Plant Food to take out those zombies!
LocStringValues.PLANT_LEVEL_PROGRESS_BAR_MAX: 没有更多形态够转换了!
LocStringValues.PLAY_LEVEL_OF_THE_DAY_DESC: Beat zombies, win seed packets and coins!
LocStringValues.POTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Believe it or not, SPUDOW! did not happen overnight. Having been forced to try out new catchphrases and focus testing as many variations as possible (Tubular? Really?), Potato Mine weeded out the competition to stick with what he knows best.
LocStringValues.POTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Potato Mines explode on contact, but they take time to arm. Plant them ahead of zombies.
LocStringValues.POTATOMINE_TOOLTIP: Explodes on contact, but takes time to arm itself
LocStringValues.POWERLILY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}From seedling to sapling, to full grown foliage, Power Lily's experience as a life coach has shown her the best way to empower and support plants everywhere.
LocStringValues.POWERLILY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Power Lilies instantly create one Plant Food out of thin air.
LocStringValues.POWERLILY_TOOLTIP: Creates one Plant Food for use
LocStringValues.POWERPLANT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}DJ Tile Turnip changed dance floors with his underground hit Turnip the Beet. What's his latest mix? When he lays it down, you'll feel the power.
LocStringValues.POWERPLANT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tile Turnips instantly create Power Tiles on planting.
LocStringValues.POWERTILE_TUTORIAL_1: Put Plant Food on a Peashooter
LocStringValues.POWERTILE_TUTORIAL_3: Awesome! You can plant anything on Power Tiles
LocStringValues.POWERUP_BEGHOULED_SHOVEL_DESCRIPTION: Use Power Shovel in Beghouled to remove plants and fill in craters!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_BEGHOULED_SHUFFLE_DESCRIPTION: Use Power Shuffle in Beghouled to shuffle plants for more matches!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_FLAMETHROWER_DESCRIPTION: Hold your finger down to thaw ice and burn zombies in Frostbite Caves!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_FLICK_DESCRIPTION: Swipe a zombie to toss it around. Swipe it twice to send it off the screen!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_PINCH_DESCRIPTION: Pinch a zombie to destroy it!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_SNOWBALL_DESCRIPTION: Hold your finger down on a zombie to throw chilling snowballs at it!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_BUTTER_DESCRIPTION: Tap to butter a single zombie in Vasebreaker!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_BUTTER_UNLOCK: Complete Egyptian Challenge Pack to unlock.
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_MOVE_DESCRIPTION: Tap to select a vase, tap again to relocate to an empty tile in Vasebreaker!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_MOVE_UNLOCK: Complete Wave {ENDLESS_WAVE} in Endless to unlock.
LocStringValues.POWERUP_VASEBREAKER_REVEAL_DESCRIPTION: Tap to reveal the contents of one vase in Vasebreaker!
LocStringValues.POWERUP_WIZARDFINGER_DESCRIPTION: Hold your finger down on a zombie to electrocute it!
LocStringValues.PREMIUM_PLANT_QUEST_DESC: Take a premium plant out for a spin and earn rewards while doing it!
LocStringValues.PREMIUM_PLANT_QUEST_TITLE: Try a Premium Plant for Free!
LocStringValues.PRIMALPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}takes 12 seconds to shoot for the first time

{FLAVOR}Primal Pea may be primitive, but that doesn't stop him from enrolling and excelling in several software development correspondence courses.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Peas shoot heavy peas that knock zombies back.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPEASHOOTER_TOOLTIP: Shoots heavy peas that knock zombies back
LocStringValues.PRIMALPOTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}damages flying zombies as well
{KEYWORD}影响范围 (横x纵): {STAT}2x1 -- 3x3 -- 5x5

{FLAVOR}Primal Potato Mine doesn't consider himself to be primal. As far as he's concerned he's state-of-the-art. And who knows? Maybe he is.
LocStringValues.PRIMALPOTATOMINE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Potato Mines do damage over an area. They must be armed before exploding on contact.
LocStringValues.PRIMALSUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}生产量: {STAT}75

{FLAVOR}Primal Sunflower is new to all this sun-giving business, so be patient with her. She's an early adopter of the all-you-can-stuff-yourself buffet style of 生产量.
LocStringValues.PRIMALSUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Sunflowers pop out large suns instead of regular ones.
LocStringValues.PRIMALWALLNUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}takes 200 damage from a smash instead of being crushed instantly

{FLAVOR}Grunt, explains Primal Wall-nut. Grunt oog grunt-grunt, he goes on to say. Ook-urg grunty grunt grunt, he concludes. A nut of many opinions, is Primal Wall-nut.
LocStringValues.PRIMALWALLNUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Primal Wall-nuts are weaker than your average Wall-nuts, but they can withstand many smashes from Gargantuars.
LocStringValues.PRIMALWALLNUT_TOOLTIP: Blocks off zombies and greatly stalls Gargantuars
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_EXPIRED_A: Your authorization code has expired.  Go back and enter your email again to get a new code.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_GENERIC: Failed to register.  Try again later.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_SEND_CODE: We couldn't send an email to your email address.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_ERROR_TOO_MANY_: We couldn't send an email to your email address.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_LINK_PERSONAL_I: View our Privacy and Cookie Policy
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_NOTE_CODE_SENT:
We sent you an e-mail with a unique code.
Enter the code in the field above to verify your e-mail.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_NOTE_CODE_TO_YO: We'll send a unique code to the e-mail address you enter above.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_NOTE_PERSONAL_I: We do not share any of your personal information.
LocStringValues.PROGRESSIVE_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_NOTE: Your game profile has been linked to your e-mail address.
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_BEACH_DANGER_DESC: This party never stops. Just be careful not to wipe out!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_COWBOY_DANGER_DESC: It's a never-ending hootenanny. Can you handle it?
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_DARK_DANGER_DESC: Test your mettle in a battle for the ages. The Dark Ages, that is!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_DINO_DANGER_DESC: It's a never-ending martial marsh! Survive it!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_EGYPT_DANGER_DESC: There's more zombies than we can keep under wraps in this pyramid. Can you dig it?
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_EIGHTIES_DANGER_DESC: Eternal Eighties zombies assail you! You're not gonna take it!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_FUTURE_DANGER_DESC: Experience your Terror from Tomorrow, today. It's time for battle!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_ICEAGE_DANGER_DESC: In this frozen fracas, it's chill or be chilled!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_LOSTCITY_DANGER_DESC: Endless zombies are out to ruin your day. Don't lose your way!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_MODERN_DANGER_DESC: It's zombies from now, then, and later, all at once! DOOOOM!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_MODERN_DANGER_TITLE: Challenge Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.PROGRESS_PIRATE_DANGER_DESC: Scallywags, avast! How long can you last?
LocStringValues.PUFFSHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能在夜晚关卡使用

{FLAVOR}Puff-shroom is hip to all the latest social networks. He loves to surf Sporebook, FungusedIn and ShroomstaGram. But sometimes he misses the simple camaraderie of a good ol' fashioned Lawn Area Network party.
LocStringValues.PUFFSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Puff-shrooms are short-range shooters that last for a limited time.
LocStringValues.PUFFSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Short-range shooter, lasts for a limited time
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_COINS_IN_APP_STORE: Visit the App Store to purchase coins?
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR: Unable to contact store at this time.  Please try again later.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_BODY:
Unable to complete purchase.
Please try again.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_DEFERRED_TRANSACTION_CONF: You already have an in-progress transaction for the requested product.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_COINS: Oops, you don't have enough coins for that!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_GEMS: Oops, you don't have enough gems for that! Win gems in Pinata Parties and quests, or acquire them in the store.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_INVALID_SKU: The requested SKU could not be found in the catalog.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED_BODY: You are not authorized to purchase on this device.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_BODY: Either you're not connected to the internet, or there are issues connecting to the application store!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_GEMIUM_BUNDLE: Items purchased with Gems are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_RECLAIM_ITEM_BODY: Item has already been purchased on another profile. Claim for current profile at no cost!
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_REFRESH_FAIL: Some purchase were not refreshed correctly, please try again.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_COINS: Plants purchased with Coins are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_GEMS: Plants purchased with Gems are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PURCHASE_SINGLE_PROFILE_PLANT_WITH_TICKE: Plants purchased with Tickets are not shared with all profiles.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSCalendars用法Description: This app would like access to your calendar to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSCamera用法Description: This app would like to access your camera to update your profile picture and display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSLocationWhenInUse用法Description: This app would like access to your location when in use to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSPhotoLibrary用法Description: This app would like to save images to your photo library to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.PVZ2_NSReminders用法Description: This app would like to send reminders to display interactive ads.
LocStringValues.QUESTS_DISABLED_EGYPT2: Oops! You need to finish Egypt Day 2 before activating the Travel Log.
LocStringValues.QUESTS_DISABLED_LEVEL_COMPLETION: Oops! The Travel Log can't be activated yet.
LocStringValues.QUEST_CONTENT_COMPLETE: Quests are complete in this tab! Check back here soon for more Quests.
LocStringValues.QUEST_RANK_ROLLUP_AWARD_DESCRIPTION: You already completed some quests, before they even existed!  It's funny how time travel works.
LocStringValues.QUEST_RANK_UP_AWARD_DESCRIPTION: You've added another notch to your Travel Log.  Good work like that deserves to be rewarded!
LocStringValues.QUEST_RECYCLE_BUTTON_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: If you REFRESH this quest you will lose any progress you have made on it, and replace it with a new quest. You may refresh {x} times each day.
LocStringValues.QUEST_REVEAL_HEADER: You have a new quest, try to show it how awesome you are by beating it!
LocStringValues.Quests_disabled_50MB: Oops! You need to download additional content before activating the Travel Log.
LocStringValues.REDSTINGER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}only works on two leftmost columns, is defensive otherwise
{KEYWORD}Offensive HP: {STAT}200 -- 250 -- 300
{KEYWORD}Defensive HP: {STAT}600 -- 750 -- 900

{FLAVOR}Flexibility is of key importance to Red Stinger. I do stretching exercises every morning, he says. It's important to stay mentally and physically nimble.
LocStringValues.REDSTINGER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Red Stingers fire two petals at full force down the lane.
LocStringValues.REDSTINGER_TOOLTIP: Fires petals when close to home and becomes defensive otherwise
LocStringValues.REINFORCEMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Reinforce-mint isn't scowling. He's just workshopping defense strategies, doing what he can to support the team. Maybe he's scowling a little bit. Fine.
LocStringValues.REINFORCEMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Reinforce-mints push all zombies back and provide a temporary boost to all Reinforce-mint Family plants on the lawn.
LocStringValues.REPEATER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Everyone always asks me if we've met before, says Repeater. Everyone always asks me if we've met before. Wait, did I just say that?
LocStringValues.REPEATER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Repeaters fire two peas at a time.
LocStringValues.REPEATER_TOOLTIP: Shoots two peas at the enemy
LocStringValues.RESTART_LEVEL: 你确认你要重新开始这一关吗?
LocStringValues.RESTART_LEVEL_BODY: 你确认你要重新开始这一关吗?
LocStringValues.RESTORE_PURCHASES_OFFLINE_BODY: The device needs to be connected to the internet to restore purchases.
LocStringValues.RETRY_AD_FOOTER: Spend coins to try again, or watch an advertisement (if available) to retry for free.
LocStringValues.SAPFLING_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}You've gotta see Sap-fling's throwing arm to believe it. He may be young, but everyone agrees ... the kid's got TALENT. Scouts from some of the biggest Pinecone Ball teams have been keeping a close eye on him. He could be headed to the majors. Oh sure, some knock him for his incredibly sticky spitball. But he only uses all-natural sap, so it's entirely legal.
LocStringValues.SAPFLING_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sap-flings create zombie-slowing puddles of sap.
LocStringValues.SEEDBANK_PLANT_LOCKED_TEMPORARILY: Complete {LevelName} to unlock using the {PlantName} on this level.
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_CHALLENGE_CONSUMABLE_PLANTS: 使用{PLANT_NAME}将视为失去植物, 你确定要开始吗?
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_GRAVE_WARNING: There are no graves on this level, are you sure you want to pick the Grave Buster?
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_NO_LILY_PAD_WARNING: 你没有选择莲叶, 你确定要开始吗?
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_RENT_PLANT_NOT_ENOUGH_COINS: Oops!  Gather more coins to rent this plant.
LocStringValues.SEED_CHOOSER_SUN_WARNING: 你没有选择生产阳光的植物, 你确定要开始吗?
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_DATASHARING_PROMPT: EA collects data from your device to provide and improve our products and services, update software, dynamically serve content, provide product support, communicate with you, and personalize your experience with EA. To limit collection of data from your device to that necessary to operate this game, disable device 用法 data sharing. Disabling sharing may result in loss of functionality. CHANGES WILL BE REFLECTED IN YOUR NEXT GAME PLAY SESSION. Disable 用法 sharing?
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_DATASHARING_PROMPT_DISABLED: Sharing of 用法 statistics has been disabled for the game. EA collects data from your device to provide and improve our products and services, update software, dynamically serve content, provide product support, communicate with you, and personalize your experience with EA. To limit collection of data from your device to that necessary to operate this game, disable device 用法 data sharing. Disabling sharing may result in loss of functionality. CHANGES WILL BE REFLECTED IN YOUR NEXT GAME PLAY SESSION. Enable share 用法?
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_PRIVACY_TITLE_AGEGATE: EA's Privacy and Cookie Policy applies.
LocStringValues.SETTINGS_RESTORE_PURCHASES_PROMPT: Restoring your purchases will allow you to claim any previously purchased, non-consumable items from the store, including premium Plants and Upgrades, and purchased Worlds.
LocStringValues.SHADOWSHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}powered Shadow-shrooms make zombies that ate them poison other zombies
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}Shield僵尸, Robo-Cone僵尸 and Disco-tron 3000 can eat it without being poisoned

{FLAVOR}Despite being such a poisonous and profoundly inedible fungus, Shadow-shroom is nonetheless a total cutie-pie.
LocStringValues.SHADOWSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shadow-shrooms poison zombies who eat them, inflicting damage over time.
LocStringValues.SHADOWSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Poisons zombies over time and spreads the poison when powered
LocStringValues.SHRINKINGVIOLET_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}shrinks imps to oblivion
{KEYWORD}影响范围 (横x纵): {STAT}tile -- tile -- 3x3

{FLAVOR}Shrinking Violet started out shy, but it's remarkable how discovering a magical talent for zombie-reduction can change your whole outlook.
LocStringValues.SHRINKINGVIOLET_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shrinking Violets instantly shrink zombies in an area upon contact, forcing them to take more damage and reducing the bite damage they inflict.
LocStringValues.SHRINKINGVIOLET_TOOLTIP: Shrinks zombies and makes them weaker
LocStringValues.SLOT_UNLOCKED: A new pot is available for sprouts!
LocStringValues.SNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Although the most powerful dragon in the plant kingdom, he still dreams of wings and seeing the world beneath him.
LocStringValues.SNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snapdragons breathe fire into 6 adjacent tiles in front of it.
LocStringValues.SNAPDRAGON_TOOLTIP: Breathes fire in an area in front of it
LocStringValues.SNOWPEA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}has splash chill at Tier 2 and freeze at Tier 3
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}As a professional table tennis player, in the off-season he also enjoys skiing, playing the bongos, and spelunking.
LocStringValues.SNOWPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snow Peas fire chilling peas to slow zombies down.
LocStringValues.SNOWPEA_TOOLTIP: Shoots chilling peas that damage and slow zombies
LocStringValues.SOLARTOMATO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Solar Tomato wishes folks would just stop and enjoy the sunshine sometimes. Stop, she says. Enjoy the sunshine. I said stop! Hold it right there! Don't move! I MEAN IT!!!
LocStringValues.SOLARTOMATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Solar Tomatoes stun zombies in a 3x3 area, causing each zombie to drop 50 sun.
LocStringValues.SPEARMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}Everyone sees her as a mysterious cone-shaped creature from the coldest isles. Some believe she is from another planet, while others even suspect that there’s a giant body hiding underneath. Haha! I enjoy being a mystery. Isn’t it fun to do the most basic thing and then hide away, leaving them juggling all their conspiracies about me? ...and there she disappeared again, leaving behind a flash and why did we come to this sand field again?
LocStringValues.SPEARMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Crystall-shrooms fire chill-piercing crystal shards and hide into the ground when zombies are close.
LocStringValues.SPEARMINT_TOOLTIP: Fires chill-piercing crystal shards and hides into ground
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can't be eaten
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}can only take three hits from rolling/smashing zombies

{FLAVOR}Being the most metal plant, Spikerock has decided to hold his ultimate metal plant concert at Madison Rock Garden. Tickets have been sold out for many harvests.
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spikerocks destroy multiple rolling zombies and damage zombies that walk over them.
LocStringValues.SPIKEROCK_TOOLTIP: Breaks 3 rolling objects, hurts zombies that step on it
LocStringValues.SPIKEWEED_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can't be eaten
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}crushed by rolling/smashing zombies

{FLAVOR}Although Spikeweed grew up on the seedy side of town, his acupuncture business has been blooming.
LocStringValues.SPIKEWEED_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spikeweeds destroy one rolling zombie and hurt any zombies that step on them.
LocStringValues.SPIKEWEED_TOOLTIP: Breaks 1 rolling object, hurts zombies that step on it
LocStringValues.SPLITPEA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}It's my turn with the eyebrows, said Frontie. Fine, we'll split them, said Backie. Sprouted two minutes apart, their eyebrow war is eternal.
LocStringValues.SPLITPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Split Peas shoot peas forward and backwards.
LocStringValues.SPORESHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}My favorite arithmetic operation? wonders Spore-shroom. I guess I'd have to say, um, addition. Hang on, no... multiplication.
LocStringValues.SPORESHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spore-shrooms fire spores that create new Spore-shrooms out of defeated zombies.
LocStringValues.SPORESHROOM_TOOLTIP: Spawns new Spore-shrooms from defeated zombies
LocStringValues.SPRINGBEAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}gets sleepy after springing

{FLAVOR}He's the strong, silent type and little is known about Spring Bean. What is known though: his fan club is a million followers strong. And the ladies love him.
LocStringValues.SPRINGBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spring Beans bounce back zombies that get too close. Will bounce them into water if nearby.
LocStringValues.SPRINGBEAN_TOOLTIP: Bounces zombies back and into nearby water
LocStringValues.SPROUTS_STORE_TEXT: Need more sprouts? Choose a package below.
LocStringValues.SQUASH_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Squash is actually his stage name. His birth name was Tracy.
LocStringValues.SQUASH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Squashes will smash the first zombies that gets close, dealing massive damage.
LocStringValues.STALLIA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Life moves too quickly in our modern world, says Stallia. Folks need to slow down and smell some spores.
LocStringValues.STALLIA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Stallias slow down zombies and knock them back with a puff of perfume when the zombies are close.
LocStringValues.STALLIA_TOOLTIP: Slows zombies and knock them back in nearby lanes
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_KILL_ZOMBIES_IN_TIME: 在 {TIME} 秒内击杀 {ZOMBIES} 只僵尸
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_LASTSTAND_MINIGAME: 组建你的防线打败僵尸
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_LAWN_MOWER_WARNING: Don't trigger any lawn mowers to complete the goal.
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_MOSTLY_PRESET_PLANTS: 用大部分选定的植物生存下去
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PLANTS_AT_ONCE: 不要拥有超过 {COUNT} 株植物
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PLANTS_LOST: 不要失去超过 {COUNT} 株植物
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PLANTS_LOST_SINGLE: 不要失去超过 {COUNT} 株植物
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PLANT_BEFORE_LINE: 不要种在戴夫的霉菌地上
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PRESET_PLANTS: 用选定的植物生存下去
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PROTECT_THE_PLANT: 生存并保护危险中的植物
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_PROTECT_THE_PUFFSHROOMS: Survive and keep the Puff-shrooms alive
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_SPEND_SUN_HOLDOUT: 在 {COUNT} 秒内不要花费阳光
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_SUN_USED: 不要花费超过 {COUNT} 阳光
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_TARGET_SCORE: Defeat zombies to earn points. Get a higher score than your opponent to win.
LocStringValues.STARCHALLENGE_ZOMBIES_ONSCREEN: Have {COUNT} or more zombies on the lawn!
LocStringValues.STARFRUIT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Just a small town fruit that travelled to the big city and found his way to the future. His favorite modes of transportation: conveyor belts, hoverboards, and rockets. WEEEEE!
LocStringValues.STORE_FEATURE_PLANT_CURRENT_PROFILE: Did you like this plant?  Add it to your garden to cheese out zombies!
LocStringValues.STORE_HOT_DEALS_PROFILE_INFO: A curated selection of the week's fresh picks!
LocStringValues.STORE_MULTI_CATEGORY_INTRO: The {COUNT} seed packets are an assortment of:
LocStringValues.STORE_UPGRADES_ALL_PROFILES: Upgrades you buy in the store will be bought for all profiles
LocStringValues.STRAWBURST_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}tap to fire
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}self explode if the zombies are too close
{KEYWORD}Grow Time(s): {STAT}5/10/15 -- 5/7/12 -- 5/5/8

{FLAVOR} Big is good, says Strawburst. Though small's pretty choice as well. And you should never discount medium. I just like sizes, really.
LocStringValues.STRAWBURST_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Strawbursts grow a berry for small, medium or huge damage!
LocStringValues.STRAWBURST_TOOLTIP: Grows a berry for small, medium or huge damage
