LocStringValues.STUNION_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone knows Stunion as the battle-hardened warrior with the potent breath. But he's so much more than that. He's an accomplished pianist. He speaks five languages fluently. Heck, he's the leader of a Cub Shallots group in his spare time. Dude's got layers. Go on, peel 'em back. You'll see.
LocStringValues.STUNION_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Stunions instantly breathe a stunning cloud of gas on nearby zombies in the lane.
LocStringValues.STUNION_TOOLTIP: Stuns nearby zombies in the lane
LocStringValues.SUGGEST_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Need help choosing plants? Power Picks will set you up with aggressive attackers, a brawny guardian, and the right sun producer you need to win.
LocStringValues.SUNBEAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As the eldest of the bean brothers, Sun Bean often finds his siblings exasperating. Chili Bean is a little crude, Laser Bean is too far out, and Spring Bean is just plain lazy. Still, he loves them just the same. That's how it is with family.
LocStringValues.SUNBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sun Beans infect zombies with a sun plague. As a zombie takes damage it generates sun.
LocStringValues.SUNBEAN_TOOLTIP: Infects zombies with sun plagues that make them drop sun when damaged
LocStringValues.SUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}生产量: {STAT}50

{FLAVOR}After the release of her first major YouTuber video僵尸On Your Lawn, Sunflower's YouTuber channel has been bursting with fun. She is currently putting the final touches on her reality show TV pitch Sunflower Thinks She Can Dance.
LocStringValues.SUNFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!
LocStringValues.SUNSHROOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能在夜晚关卡使用
{KEYWORD}生产量: {STAT}25/50/75
{KEYWORD}Grow Time(s): {STAT}NA/NA -- 160/NA -- 120/240

{FLAVOR}Oh sure, Sun-shroom is known for his ever-present grin and sunny disposition. But truth be told, even he has his dark days. It ain't easy keeping things light when you live in the shadows.
LocStringValues.SUNSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sun-shrooms give small suns at first, and can grow bigger later on.
LocStringValues.SUNSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Gives less sun at first, then grows later on
LocStringValues.SURVIVE_ZOMBIE_ATTACK: 在僵尸的攻击下存活下来
LocStringValues.SWEETPOTATO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sweet Potato really is as sweet as she looks. Her favorite animal is the unicorn. Her favorite color is (and this is a direct quote) all the colors of the rainbow. When she writes the letter i, she draws a little heart where the dot belongs. Frankly, if it were anyone else, this amount of syrup would be sickening. But on her, well, it just seems right.
LocStringValues.SWEETPOTATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sweet Potatoes attract zombies from other lanes when they are close by.
LocStringValues.SWEETPOTATO_TOOLTIP: Attracts zombies from other lanes when they are close
LocStringValues.TALLNUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}takes 3000 damage from a Gargantuar's smash instead of being crushed instantly
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Tall-nut is opening a chain of stores for Tall and Taller gentlemen. I'll shell out the savings to you!
LocStringValues.TALLNUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that block flying zombies.
LocStringValues.TALLNUT_TOOLTIP: Heavy-duty wall that blocks low flying zombies
LocStringValues.TANGLEKELP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}can't drag zombies that are too big, will deal damage to them instead

{FLAVOR}Tangle Kelp likes to go deep. He majored in philosophy. Grab a root beer with him, and he'll go on and on about Nietzsche's Thus Spoke Zucchini or hold forth on Kant's Critique of Petunia Reason. It's cool and all, but sometimes you just want to keep the conversation light. Sometimes you just want to talk about the temperature of the water.
LocStringValues.TANGLEKELP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that approaches them underwater.
LocStringValues.THREEPEATER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Threepeater loves playing multiplayer in video games, but split-screen never works out because the left head always cheats.
LocStringValues.THREEPEATER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.
LocStringValues.THYMEWARP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}rewound zombies have restored health
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿
{KEYWORD}Area of Effect: {STAT}3x3 -- 5x5 -- full lawn
{KEYWORD}{STAT}Warning: using Thyme Warp on a zombie being dragged by Grimrose or Tangle Kelp will crash the game

{FLAVOR} Possibilities other to open be to need we. Warp Thyme says, Limited too far was time to approach unidirectional the that felt always I've.
LocStringValues.THYMEWARP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Thyme Warps instantly rewind time, sending zombies in an area back where they started.
LocStringValues.THYMEWARP_TOOLTIP: Sends zombies in an area back where they started
LocStringValues.TOADSTOOL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}gulps down Imps, flying zombies and animal zombies instantly instead, producing sun afterwards
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Toadstool just can't stand being idle. I keep everything that I want to do on lists, and keep the lists where I can see them so that I'm always motivated! she said. Whenever there's work to be done, she's always the first to hop to it.
LocStringValues.TOADSTOOL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Toadstools use their tongue to slap zombies repeatedly.
LocStringValues.TOADSTOOL_TOOLTIP: Slaps zombies repeatedly with her tongue and gulps some instantly
LocStringValues.TORCHWOOD_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can be stacked several times for different projectiles
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物

{FLAVOR}Torchwood and Snapdragon have become fast friends. They like to hang out at either the Tiki Lounge or the Renaissance Faire.
LocStringValues.TORCHWOOD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Torchwoods light up certain projectiles for extra damage.
LocStringValues.TORCHWOOD_TOOLTIP: Light up certain projectiles for extra damage

{KEYWORD}生产量: {STAT}100 -- 120 -- 150

{FLAVOR}Twin Sunflower's super-chic line of ultra-expensive sunglasses has been a huge hit wherever she goes. Due to this she has been unable to travel without being swarmed by the Poppyrazzi.

{FLAVOR}你可以从It's Cold Up Here, Ice Bingo, 和 Surfin' Swedes等令人难以置信的纪录片中认出冰西瓜的声音.

LocStringValues.WITCHHAZEL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}优先锁定巫师僵尸
{KEYWORD}不同形态将僵尸变为: {STAT}阳光番茄(T1) -- 月光花(T2) -- 全息坚果(T3)

{FLAVOR}作为植物王国中最强大的魔法使用者之一, 她经常被选中参加植物和僵尸之间的魔法决斗. 不过, 她并不太稳定--因为她以快速捕捉其他植物而闻名. 她还喜欢抚摸她视线范围内的任何猫...和脱口秀节目. 女巫也干那种事吗?
LocStringValues.WITCHHAZEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 金缕梅女巫将僵尸变成其他植物.

LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_YETI_EVENT_ALERT_DESCRIPTION: A Treasure Yeti has spawned in this level. Destroy him and get treasure before he vanishes!
LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_YETI_OTHER_WORLD_ALERT_DESCRIPT: A Treasure Yeti has spawned in this world. Destroy him and get treasure before he vanishes!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_BEACH: Take a trip back to the '60s and hang ten on the ocean waves! Tides are changing and those gnarly zombies make it not-so-safe to go back in the water!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_COWBOY: Head down the dusty trail for a showdown with the outlaw zombies of yesteryear! Gather up your plants for the big Brain Rush of 1850!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_DARK: Bring out your undead to the year 948! Harvest mushrooms in the dark of knight and get medieval on zombies from the days of yore!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_DINO: The ground thunders under the awful feet of terrible lizards! Dinosaurs prowl the past, provoking prehistoric zombies into a frenzy of ancient antipathy!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_EIGHTIES: Stock up on hairspray and rewind to the 1980s! With synthesized music and voraciously radical zombies, this heinous dance party will, like, totally tax you to the MAX!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_FUTURE: In the year 2323, the zombies will have brain extraction down to a science! Can the plants of the future save you from the undead of tomorrow?
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_ICEAGE: Explore the frozen wastes of prehistory and chill out with the coolest zombies ever. Beware the winds or your plants will be frozen veggies.
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_LOSTCITY: Discover the vanished city of gold, where sun is plentiful and misplaced zombies abound! Use 特点 tiles for extra sun, for these treasure-seekers are no idol threat!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_MODERN: The end is the beginning! Return to moments before you left in a contemporary contest stocked with zombies of every egregious era, as you face them all in a huge minigame bash!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_COMMUNITY: The home of many great battles, designed and handcrafted by the community themselves! Battle against the wits of other players - can you come out on top?
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_PIRATE: The year is 1679, the golden age of zombie piracy! Keep your booty close and your plants closer as zombies take to the seas to plunder your brains!
LocStringValues.XSHOT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}有时, 旋转芜菁会听到其他植物互相八卦. 你注意到某某的体重在增加吗? 他们可能会说. 或者听说某某正在和某某约会. 你能相信吗? 但旋转芜菁不是那种闲言碎语的植物. 她不想在背后谈论任何人. 她只是尽全力超越它.
LocStringValues.XSHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 旋转芜菁沿对角线方向发动攻击.
LocStringValues.XSHOT_TOOLTIP: 沿对角线方向发动攻击
LocStringValues.YETI_FUE_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: When a yeti appears on the map, go after him quickly! If you can spot and defeat him in the level, he'll drop fabulous prizes!
LocStringValues.ZENGARDEN_USE_BOOST_BODY: 种植时自动释放一次大招.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_BEE_TUTORIAL_USE_BEE: Tap a plant. The bee will speed it up!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_BUY_SLOT_DIALOG_BODY: Opens up another pot to plant sprouts and earn sweet loot and boosts!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_DESTROY_BOOST_DIALOG_BODY: Are you sure you want to shovel this plant?  It will lose its boost.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_COLLECT_COINS: Here's some coins while you work towards a boost!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_RETURN_REMINDE: Return to Zen Garden often to boost your plants!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_USE_BOOST: Sunflower is now boosted! The boost lasts for one level.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_WATER_PLANT_FO: She's ready for water. Keep her growing to get a boost!
It's a Sunflower! She's thirsty for water.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_COLLECT_COI: Marigold's growing up! And she has coins for you.
A batch of coins and she's done!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_PLACE_SPROU: You may plant another sprout now!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_RETURN_REMI: Return to Zen Garden often to earn coins!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_WATER_PLANT: It's a Marigold! She needs water.
The Marigold is ready for water.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MULTIPLANT_TEXT: You may plant multiple sprouts to add a bonus to your chance to get an uncommon or rare plant.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_WORTH_NO_SPROUTS: The bee will take your plant, but it hasn't grown enough to be worth any sprouts.  Sell anyway?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BARRELROLLER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}桶被摧毁后放出小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}火爆辣椒烧掉桶时不会放出僵尸

{FLAVOR}滚筒僵尸 is part of a super underground secret awesome club. You probably haven't heard of it. Also, his left arm is slightly longer than his right arm.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BARRELROLLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的桶碾压植物并为他提供了很好的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Go to the beach, they said. Put a cone on your head, they said. So, yeah, that's what Pompadour Conehead did. He's at his best when following simple instructions.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的海星路障使他的血量是飞机头僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pompadour Buckethead tried to learn to play the ukulele. He figured it would be easier to learn than the guitar on account of how small it is. But his stiff fingers ... they just weren't made for it. Now he just bangs on his bucket. And he's not half-bad either.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的贝壳铁桶给了他很好的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pompadour僵尸 recently noticed that he was wearing only one flip-flop. He THINKS he lost the other one while doing the limbo at a bonfire party the other night. But to be honest, that entire night is a little hazy ... and that flip-flop could be anywhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}See that starfish on Bikini Conehead's cone? She put that there herself. She gets a lot of compliments on it too. And sure enough, now it seems like everyone is accessorizing with starfish. She's a trendsetter, that one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 她的海星路障使他的血量是比基尼僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Bikini Buckethead had big ambitions. She wanted to do more than just lurch around on a beach all day. Her life's dream: to perform internationally with a synchronized swimming team. Sadly, the nose plug was her undoing. If she only had a nose ...
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 她的贝壳铁桶给了他很好的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Is it weird that we haven't seen any female zombies before? Some say yes. Some say no. Either way, Bikini僵尸 is used to breaking new ground. She's not afraid to go where no woman zombie has gone before. You could call her a pioneer. You could call her a hero.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FISHERMAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}打飞面前一格的植物

{FLAVOR}Everyone is tired of Fisherman僵尸's fishing stories. He's always bragging about the size of his catch. Time and time again, he claims to have caught the big one. But the fact of the matter is, no one has seen him actually catch a fish. Not once. It's more than a little suspicious.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FISHERMAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 用鱼钩将远方的植物拉向他.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Talk about a disgruntled zombie. Beach Flag僵尸 is fed up. None of the other zombies seem to appreciate just how difficult it is for him to swim while holding a flag. Not once have they thanked him for doing the hard work that needs to be done. So it shouldn't come as a surprise: He's been interviewing for jobs elsewhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波巨浪僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用浮木砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时投出美人鱼小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}This big guy loves the water. When he's deep down in it, he feels light as a feather. He feels like he's flying. Most importantly, during those precious moments, he feels as if the weight of Imp Mermaid僵尸 has been lifted from his shoulders.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 这个巨大僵尸的力量并不来自贝类.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Mermaid僵尸 couldn't decide whether to wear the top made out of coconut shells or the top made out of seashells. She went with the slinky coconut-shell number because, really, the seashells are soooo last wave.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的防御, 然后挣扎前进.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_OCTOPUS_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}It started innocently enough. One day, Octo僵尸 decided to get a pet octopus. But he loved that octopus so much, he got another and another ... and another. Next thing you know, he was volunteering at an octopus rescue shelter. And now, well, no one wants to tell him, but he's pretty much the undersea equivalent of a cat lady. You should see how many are living at his house. It's quite startling.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_OCTOPUS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 扔出章鱼包裹你的植物. 被包裹的植物在章鱼被摧毁前无法行动.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SNORKEL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Snorkel僵尸 has a hard time getting the Bikini僵尸. He's tried offering them flowers, jewelry, and even chocolate-covered brains. But nothing seems to work. They just can't seem to see past the snorkel on his face.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SNORKEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 潜水僵尸躲在水下, 躲避大部分的攻击.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SURFER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以用冲浪板摧毁一株植物

{FLAVOR}Surfer僵尸 took up surfing just last year. At first, he only did it because he thought it would make him look cool. But he was a natural. Now he can hang 10 with the best of them. Now he's headed to the pro circuit. Now he IS cool.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SURFER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 冲浪僵尸在水上无视植物, 在陆地上会拿起冲浪板.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEGHOULED_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Side effects of the tablet include: Can't touch brainz, can't take a shower (not that he needs one) and hallucinating his distant cousins from Ancient Egypt. Man, this is one hell of a strong tablet he stole from Wizard僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEGHOULED_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的魔法盾牌提供了保护, 也让他无法啃食植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以承受樱桃炸弹和其他灰烬植物的攻击
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT}her speed increases once she's free

{FLAVOR}The cage? She got caught once by an aquarium due to being mistaken for a mermaid. She ate the owner then broke out of there on her own - caged and all. The coral? She stumbled onto a reef on her way back. The octopus? She got inspired by her favorite comic character. Psst... tell no one it's a cosplay prop.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 她的坚固金属笼子使她对伤害有极大的抗性.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Each Camel僵尸 is an excellent ballroom dancer, practicing every day by holding up mysterious signs with strange symbols. They call it The Camel Dance.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 成群结队出现, 通常为3个, 4个或6个僵尸一队.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_MANYHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the many hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ONEHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the one hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_SEGMENT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Just another camel in the group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_TWOHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the two hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CANNON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Imps joined the Order of the Cannon Fraternity, Kappa Pea, and quickly rose through the ranks due to the constant firing of their leadership.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CANNON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 向草坪中央发射小鬼僵尸. 一段时间后炸膛并喷射出大量小鬼.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 被释放到草坪上的鸡将全速冲向你的脑子.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_FARMER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After publishing the fourth study on Ornithology, and four years of research at the Hadron Collider, Chicken Wrangler僵尸 has finally solved the riddle of what came first.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_FARMER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 受到伤害时放出大量僵尸鸡.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The sheriff of these here parts. Please pull over the horse and pull out your driver's license, registration, and proof of brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的牛皮路障使他的血量是牛仔僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A five-time winner of the temporal chili cook-off. Those Egyptian zombies don't know their chili, but Cowboys love their beans. The more you eat, the more you brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的辣椒铁桶给了他很好的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cart-Head僵尸 could probably move a lot faster if he did a handstand and rolled, but he's not thinking that far ahead.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 矿车头僵尸矿车帽给了他非常高的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cowboy僵尸 thinks he's the roughest, toughest, meanest zombie varmint in the west, south and east. He's anxious to test his skills in the central coast region.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波牛仔僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Arrows point to the brain on Cowboy Rally's Flag, as if to say, Hey, everyone, I would like to emphasize this image. It's canny design.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: 牛仔大动员僵尸标志着一大堆僵尸的到来
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用烙铁砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤后扔出骑牛小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}Likes candy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Peasant is just happy to have a cone over his head. Times are tough, man. He knows a lot of zombies don't even have that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的石制路障使他的血量是农夫僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}None of the other zombies seem to understand just how versatile Buckethead Peasant's choice of headwear is. Sure, his bucket makes for a great battle helmet. But just last night, he cooked a truly divine brain stew in it. And next time you see his band, check out what he's using for a kick drum.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的锻造铁桶给了他很好的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Knight僵尸 was just as surprised as anyone when僵尸 King promoted him. He'd never say this out loud, but he's not sure he deserves the position. He's not sure he has what it takes to wear the armor. But like they say, Fake it 'til you make it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 国王给他的头盔提供了惊人的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Someone shouted, Bring out your undead! And then Peasant僵尸 found himself here. He simply doesn't remember anything that happened before that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}They keep telling Peasant僵尸 that there is no greater reward than being granted the banner to carry into battle. But when he sees other Peasant僵尸being granted cones, buckets, and even helms, he thinks maybe they're making that up so they don't hurt his feelings.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波黑暗僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用锤子砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤后扔出僧侣小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}When Dark Ages Gargantuar wants to find pantaloons that fit him, he has to shop at the Enormous & Towering store. He hates it though. It's embarrassing. He just wants to shop for clothes where all the other zombies shop.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Frankly, Imp Monk僵尸 decided to don the robes because of the sweet haircut that went with them.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后蹒跚前行.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DRAGON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp僵尸 knows he's too old to wear a dragon costume like a kid on Halloween. But he doesn't care. Let the others judge. His spirit animal is a dragon, and he feels closer to his true self when he's dressed like this.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 和正常小鬼一样, 但免疫火焰和灰烬伤害.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone loves to laugh at Jester僵尸's clownish routines. But what no one knows is that he has a Master of Fine Arts from the Chewliard Performing Arts School. Heck, he's been on stage with some of the finest classical theatre companies this side of the lawn. But sometimes you just gotta go where the paycheck is.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 反弹大部分射向他的子弹.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As Shakespeare once wrote, Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown. And僵尸 King couldn't agree more. It is incredibly difficult to get a good night's sleep with a crown on your head. That thing is all kinds of uncomfortable.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 给附近的农民僵尸授予骑士头盔.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}All the zombies agree, Wizard僵尸's powers of transmutation are impressive. But what they don't get is ... why sheep? Everyone knows it would be more helpful if the Wizard used his powers to turn plants into, say, more zombies. But yeah, no one is going to say that to his face.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 将植物变成不会动的羊.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Conehead僵尸 is trying to get the jump on the whole traffic cone idea. He figures it'll be a HUGE market in about 150 million years.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 路障, 又或者是用绳子捆在一起的像路障的旧角使他的血量是侏罗纪僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: The real question, the burning mystery, is: where did he find blue fur for his outfit?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 画着的桶提供了和实物一样多的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: Contrary to his name, Jurassic Fossilhead's fossil head isn't actually a fossil. That skull's maybe a week and a half old, tops.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 龙骨不仅提供了惊人的保护, 而且显得十分豪华.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}If you were to extract DNA from the Amberhead僵尸 and combine it with the DNA of a frog, you'd probably be breaking the law at some point.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 琥珀头僵尸的琥珀给了他非常高的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Bully is slow, stupid, and smells bad. But hey, at least he's punctual.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 一个移动缓慢, 抗伤害的僵尸, 免疫原始豌豆的击退效果.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Somebody tied rocks to Jurassic Rockpuncher's hands. Being unable to remove them (because he had rocks tied to his hands), he was left with no choice but to roll with it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HE: 野人搏击者用绑在手上的石头击打植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_DESCRIPTION: 侏罗纪僵尸并不原始, 你看, 他还戴着领带呢!!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: He's not only got a flag, but he's also got a can-do attitude and a fierce hunger for success. Success and brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波侏罗纪僵尸的到来
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Where did Jurassic Rally僵尸 get his fancy new flag? Nobody knows. It's a mystery. The police should look into it. Or maybe we could get a fund together and hire a detective. It's a real puzzle.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 侏罗纪大动员僵尸标志着一大堆侏罗纪僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用骨头砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出侏罗纪小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫原始豌豆的击退

{FLAVOR}Jurassic Gargantuar wonders how there can be zombies millions of years before the advent of humanity. He doesn't let it get in the way of his plant-bashing, though.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_IMP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can form a band together to quickly march towards your defense

{FLAVOR}This nasty little nipper can make a serious dent in your defenses if left to his own devious devices.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 一个更小, 更弱, 但更凶猛的侏罗纪僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DISCO_MECH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}After some initial problems with the sideburn suspension system, the Disco-tron 3000 went on to become the shufflin' dance-bot of doom it is today.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DISCO_MECH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 音乐响起时召唤迪斯科舞者.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用石棺砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出木乃伊小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}True fact #1: The pyramids were built in an attempt to make Mummified Gargantuar seem small. It didn't work. True fact #2: The Sphinx isn't missing its nose... that is the face of... Gargantuar.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 皇家木乃伊系列中的巨型僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Mummy prefers to laze around the tomb, hop up on the urns, and scratch at the sarcophagi. The sound of him coughing up a hairball is one you will never forget.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后潜行前进.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_8BIT_DESCRIPTION: Being made out of light and positional co-ordinates has no effect on this erzatz zombie's ravenous hunger for tangy brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_8BIT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 一个由超酷街机产生的像素僵尸. 有普通, 路障以及铁桶口味.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARCADE_DESCRIPTION: When it's a choice between quarters for games and quarters for laundry, Arcade僵尸 is prepared to make the ultimate stinky sacrifice.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARCADE_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 推着一个制造八位僵尸的街机.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: Neon Conehead僵尸 used to be a big believer in de-evolution, but then he forgot what it meant.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 路障提供保护, 并聚集正义的旋律.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: Neon Buckethead僵尸 had to go all the way to the dump to find a headband he really liked.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 铁桶提供很高的保护, 这正是铁桶所做的.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BOOMBOX_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以随时随地出现在草坪上
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}收音机对地刺, 钢地刺, 魔音甜菜和电流醋栗无效

{FLAVOR}Boombox僵尸 doesn't want to buy, sell or process anything; he just really wants to consume your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BOOMBOX_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 高举一个播放让所有植物沉迷其中的旋律的收音机.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BREAKDANCER_DESCRIPTION: Delivers only the freshest moves at bargain basement prices.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BREAKDANCER_DESCRIPTION_: 在rap音乐时将僵尸踢向前方.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION: He's cutting down on his head-banging so as not to bang his head clean off.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 常见的喜爱音乐的僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: Fluorescent colors and little yellow plastic strips are the marks of a truly hip, groundbreaking new style of zombie wave flag.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波摇滚僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用吉他砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在metal音乐时砸击会发出音波
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出朋克小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}Hair Metal Gargantuar only knows one chord, but you'd better believe he'll play it all night and then some.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GLITTER_DESCRIPTION: Glitter僵尸 inspires zombies everywhere to boogie their brains out, whether it's just one moment or maybe forever, or at least until the lights come on and they're kicking everybody out.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GLITTER_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 在pop音乐时留下彩虹保护身后的僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_IMP_DESCRIPTION: Impunk's lyrics have been described as banal, incoherent, and totally expressive of the Zompunk movement at its finest.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后对你的防线产生损害.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_MC_DESCRIPTION: MC Zom-B doesn't want you to know it, but his fancy bling is really just gold-plated zinc he got from his grandma.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_MC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 在rap音乐时挥动麦克风伤害周围的植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_PUNK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}磁力菇可以直接吸走他的头

{FLAVOR}Punk僵尸's piercings represent his individuality and his belief in personal freedom, or maybe just that he fell face-first into a sewing machine.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_PUNK_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 在punk音乐时将植物踢向后方.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}冰属性的攻击会熄灭火把

{FLAVOR}His impressive friendly mutton chops have always kept food in them for weeks, making sure his explorations are filled with snacks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 拿着一个可以烧毁植物的火把.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}冰属性的攻击会熄灭他和火把

{FLAVOR}Torchlight僵尸 has no fear of the dark. That's not because he's always got a torch, however, but rather because as a zombie he has no capacity for fear in the first place.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 拿着一个更大的瞬间烧毁植物的火把.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FOOTBALL_MECH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫原始豌豆的击退和冰冻

{FLAVOR}Now past his prime, Mecha-Football僵尸 is ready to be put back into the game. Until he gets some brains, concussions aren't a concern.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FOOTBALL_MECH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 将植物向后推, 而不会啃食它们.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Has tried to calculate the volume of his mathematically perfect cone, but he always ends up dreaming about brain π.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的聚合路障使他的生命值是未来僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Other zombies call him old-fashioned for being nostalgic for the year 2008.  It was a simpler time when brains were brains, zombies were zombies, and those punk plants kept to themselves.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的高科技铁桶给了他很好的防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The force field gets its unique color from frequency harmonics and a liberal dose of purple paint.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 全息头僵尸的全息力场给了他非常高的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION: Future zombies look good in red shirts. Future fact #23: Nothing bad happens to red shirts.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sometimes Future Flag僵尸 regrets having to be at the bleeding edge of zombie wave advancement technology.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波未来僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用双臂砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用激光眼随机消灭植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出2个机械虫小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫击退和冰冻

{FLAVOR}The imp pilots of the Gargantuar Prime series are handpicked by Dr. Zomboss himself. They are the imp elite.  The small, the mean, and the fearless! But mostly the ones who can drive a stick shift.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 拥有一切: 重型装甲、激光眼、粉碎武器和机械虫部署系统.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He always wanted to see the world, be his own boss, and meet and consume interesting brains. He still doesn't understand how he got stuck in this cramped Bug Bot job 24/7.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后向前跳跃.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}飞过大部分低矮植物
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}The Jetpack僵尸 was an early adopter during the brain acquisition tech explosion of 2113. Little did he know he would be stuck with version 1.0 of the simple jetpack.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DISCO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}A zombie who 'lives' for drama, he's an original cast member of the stage musical Disco is BACK! For Revenge! His signature dance move is The Weed Whacker.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_VETERAN_DESCRIPTIO:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}Blastronaut's rocket-pack is strictly ornamental; his hovering ability comes from a deep meditative state and from being full of helium.
宇航员僵尸飞越大部分植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}只能制造9次屏障

{FLAVOR}Shield僵尸 developed his system using funds from a BiteStarter campaign. The push goal for pushing plants was not met.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 产生一面电磁盾, 保护自己和周围的僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Conehead僵尸 was the first zombie to invent the cone. He lashed the horn of a mammoth to a slab of petrified wood ... and boom! A cone! The invention of the cone changed everything for the zombies. EVERYTHING.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的猛犸角路障使他的血量是冰河僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Buckethead僵尸 likes rocks. He likes rocks A LOT. He strapped a rock to his head and called it a bucket. None of the other Cave僵尸know what a bucket is, but they like his style.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的石桶给了他很高的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}One day, a Cave僵尸 fell head-first into a glacial stream. It had been a bad day already, so he lay there in the frigid water for a long time contemplating the insignificance of his life. When he finally stood up, he discovered that his head was encased in ice. At last, his life had meaning! He was unique! He was Blockhead僵尸! At least, that's his story and he's sticking to it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他头上的冰砖给了他惊人的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave僵尸 was busy painting handprints on cave walls when he was told to start fighting plants. He's not sure why he's fighting plants, but he hopes he can get back to painting soon. He was feeling inspired. He had plans for some big pieces. Art school was finally paying off.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DODO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dodo Rider believes dodos are the future of transportation. He believes a public dodo-riding system is not only a wise expenditure of tax dollars but would help the vast majority of zombies get where they need to go more efficiently. Everyone keeps telling him there's no future in dodos, but he refuses to listen.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DODO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 渡渡鸟可以飞越大部分障碍和麻烦的植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Flag僵尸 has been in the flag-carrying business for a long time. It's been his life's work. He's good at it. But sometimes, just sometimes, he longs for a change. He wonders if he could be good at something else. He wonders if he could leave it all behind and start fresh. He's pretty sure he's having a mid-life crisis.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波冰河僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用冰锥砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出3只雪人小鬼僵尸
{FLAVOR}Somewhere along the line, Sloth Gargantuar contracted a bad case of Yeti Imps. He used soap, medicinal powders, and a salve made from sloth slobber in an attempt to get rid of them ... to no avail. But the truth is, he's grown used to their presence. The darn things are itchy. They're always squabbling. They nag him endlessly. But at this point, he'd probably miss them if they ever cleared up.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 一个巨大的地懒皮僵尸和一群小鬼僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_HUNTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Shhhhh ... Hunter僵尸 didn't actually kill that sabertooth tiger. He found the skin at a thrift store. Also, he's a vegetarian. Tell no one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_HUNTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 向你的植物投掷雪球并冰冻他们.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Yeti Imp recently took up knitting. He started with a scarf, moved on to mittens and eventually knitted an entire bodysuit out of hair he shaved off of Yeti僵尸. He just loves knitting. When those needles are in his hands, he feels a sense of calm he's never felt before.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后缓慢前进.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Troglobite has been pushing ice blocks across the tundra day in and day out for as long as he can remember. It's cold and exhausting work, and frankly, he's ready for a vacation. He'd like to go somewhere sunny and warm for a change. He'd like to relax in the sand. He hears Big Wave Beach is nice this time of year.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 一个强壮的在草坪上推冰块的僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以啃食前后一格的植物, 但啃食伤害只有一般僵尸的30%
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}如果进场后30s内没有啃食, 对最后方的植物造成1000伤害

{FLAVOR}Mime僵尸 hates being stuffed into a box. If you ever see him stuck in one he will fervently express his distaste in the most clear and concise way possible: angrily waving his hands around. We presume so, because he didn't say anything.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION_H: 这个默剧僵尸有很多花招.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Weasel Hoarder claims she's the one who wrote the song Pop! Goes the Weasel. And for eons now, she's been demanding royalties for it. But everyone just ignores her. They know that Weasel Hoarder can't even carry a tune, much less write a catchy ditty about the sound vermin make when hugged a bit too tightly.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 被释放时将无视浮冰全速冲向你的大脑.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LEPRACHAUN_DODO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}遇到原始植物, 爆炸种子, 树脂, 黄金砖和地雷会起飞

{FLAVOR}She literally came from hell - if you count hell being a dark underground cave full of deadly icicles. Although she looks crazy and destructive, she is just as silly and fun-loving as other zombie animals - playing under the snow, talking with her zombie fellows (she only knows how to speak Dodo-ean though)... the list goes on. For some reason she is deeply afraid of elder plants - nobody knows why, though.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LEPRACHAUN_DODO_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 最强大的渡渡鸟, 当她没起飞时不会被大部分植物察觉!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: No one ever presumes that he's Dr. Unlivingstone. Just once, though, he wishes that someone would.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 他的探险路障使他的血量是探险家僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: Buckethead Adventurer's greatest discovery was that one morning, without warning or reason, there was a bucket on his head.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 他结实的铁桶给了他很好的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_BUG_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}菜问击杀蜻蜓时不会落下僵尸

{FLAVOR}Bug僵尸 and Bug make a great team, partly because Bug gives Bug僵尸 great mobility, but mostly because they share an intense disinterest in horses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_BUG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 这只昆虫带着一个僵尸并飞过你的大部分防御.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_CRYSTALSKULL_DESCRIPTION: Unlike the more famous crystal skulls, turquoise skulls are totally non-mysterious and common as dirt.
使用头骨偷取你的阳光, 并充能一束激光.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION: Adventurer僵尸 just went looking for a jolly good show, and somehow ended up in the Lost City. Hmm. Yes. Quite. is all that he would say on the matter.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_EXCAVATOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}完全阻挡正向的子弹
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}会铲击高坚果

{FLAVOR}Excavator僵尸 once heard a song about having a hammer. He liked the idea, but decided it was too mainstream for him - so he got a shovel. Now he's confident that he's clearly the coolest zombie, the others are just too jealous to admit it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: Flag Adventurer僵尸 is always shouting Tally ho! as he leads the charge. At least, he's shouting it in his head.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波失落僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用熄灭的火把砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时扔出失落小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}Porter Gargantuar dreams of the discovery that will make him powerful and influential. Maybe then the Imps will be the one carrying him around. It's always nice to have dreams.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMPPORTER_DESCRIPTION: Imp Porter is stronger than he looks. He's also more charming, smarter and has a better education.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMPPORTER_DESCRIPTION_HE: 在黄金砖上搭建帐篷, 帐篷中会源源不断出现僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Nepotism got Lost City Imp where he is. He's Bug僵尸's second cousin thrice removed, but he parlayed that connection into a sweet gig getting carried around in a little box.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后前进.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_JANE_DESCRIPTION: Wealthy beyond reason, the Parasol僵尸 lived a life of luxury - when what she craved was a life of adventure. She funded the expedition to the Lost City and set out to see its wonders for herself, never forgetting to bring her trusty parasol. In case it rains, she explained - but it only came out sounding like Brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_LOSTPILOT_DESCRIPTION: He faked his pilot's license and figured nobody would notice. But they did.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_RELICHUNTER_DESCRIPTION: Relic Hunter has hunted some pretty impressive relics in his day. Idols, antiques, curios... he's hunted 'em all.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_RELICHUNTER_DESCRIPTION_: 荡过部分防御, 然后快速前进.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MECH_CONE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫原始豌豆的击退和冰冻

{FLAVOR}僵尸 engineers considered the orange cone the height of zombie protective technology. It wasn't until they perfected the design for the Robo-Cone that someone remembered the bucket.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MECH_CONE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 路障装甲为驾驶员提供超级高的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_ALLSTAR_DESCRIPTION: Football僵尸 is a third-round draft pick and shows a lot of promise, but come on, his salary demands are beyond ridiculous for someone who still doesn't know what football is. Ten million brains per year? For FIFTY YEARS?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_ALLSTAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 一个向你防线进攻的重型僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_BALLOON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Balloon僵尸 has no idea where the balloon came from, but he's going with it and he's open to seeing where it takes him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_BALLOON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 气球允许僵尸在停留在空中, 并越过大部分障碍和地面防御.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_NEWSPAPER_DESCRIPTION: You can't really blame him for getting so upset; he was THIS close to finishing the crossword (23 down was Brains.)
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_NEWSPAPER_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: 报纸为僵尸提供保护, 破碎后僵尸会暴怒.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_SUPERFANIMP_DESCRIPTION: Flint Imp (not his name though) was the first one to get into fashion, and has two left feet - but that's another story. On the other day, he was looking for some decoration for his dress and found some shiny rocks. By curiosity, he tied those to the dress and somehow wrapped his hand around a bunch of straws too. Who knew it would be the perfect ingredients for a failure fashion disaster?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_SUPERFANIMP_DESCRIPTION_HE: 一个穿着高度易燃服装的新潮小鬼-只会自燃.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Mummy僵尸 prefers the circular cone shape over the typical pyramid shape. It's a fashion thing, and Conehead Mummy僵尸 always stays ahead of fashion.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的眼镜蛇路障使他的血量是木乃伊僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Mummy僵尸 graduated Magna Zom Louder from僵尸 Academy where he learned to utilize his diaphragm during groaning lessons.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的沙桶给了他很好的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pyramid-Head僵尸 isn't aware that his pyramid is pyramid-shaped. He's a little slow in that respect.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的金字塔形头盔给了他三角形般的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Is he a mummy? Is he a zombie? It turns out he's a zombie who's rolled himself in toilet paper to protect his fair skin. True fact!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Egyptian Flag僵尸 is so far behind he thinks he's in first place. He's clearly living in de-Nile.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 标志着一大波埃及僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sometimes, a regular Flag Mummy僵尸 simply isn't enough to inspire the desired amount of terror and disgust. In these instances, upgrading to the Egypt Rally僵尸 isn't the sensible choice, it's the only choice.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HE: 他以更大的活力和好斗的态度庆祝新一批木乃伊僵尸的到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_NEWSPAPER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sunday Edition僵尸 REALLY loves the comics section, which is why his rage is so all-consuming when it is torn to tatters before he's finished reading it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_NEWSPAPER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 报纸为僵尸提供保护, 报纸破碎后僵尸会暴怒.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PELICAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Pelican僵尸 upgraded from the Seagull僵尸 and has no regrets. No egrets, either. Just a pelican.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PELICAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 鹈鹕僵尸可以在没有甲板的路上飞行, 忽略土豆地雷和冰冻生菜等低矮植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can withstand Cherry Bombs and other instants
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT}moves like a hungry zombie once free

{FLAVOR}The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的石棺提供了很高的保护, 但也减缓了他的速度.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CLEOPATRA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}People expect Cleopatra to be a queen with sophisticated hobbies- like being a craft master, an omnious prophet or even a wine snob. Instead, we got a dance master with a penchant for cryptic hieroglyphs - talk about something subverting expectations.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CLEOPATRA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 在上下左右方向召唤太阳神僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIANO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pianist僵尸 only knows two songs, and they're both groaners.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIANO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的钢琴可以摧毁植物, 让牛仔僵尸们跳舞并改变路线.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Pirate is a simple zombie. When asked what his favorite dish is, he'd think for a moment, straighten his ascot, and say, Rrurrarrbrains. Perhaps he could borrow a cup, neighbor?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的海盗旗路障使他的血量是海盗僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Pirate僵尸 is looking for his bucket. Have you seen it? It's where? Up where? Speak up, he can't hear you.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的结实木桶给了他很好的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cannonhead僵尸 tried to relive his childhood life once again, but he was too old to fit inside a cannon and shoot himself over the sea. Merely wanting to know the feeling, he's been sticking with it for too long, and now he can't really take it off anymore... At least, that's his headcannon when he talks about himself anyway.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 加农炮头僵尸的加农炮头给了他非常高的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_BARREL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}火爆辣椒消灭桶时不会放出僵尸

{FLAVOR}What could it be? Could it be gold? Or some sort of other kind of treasure?  Who knows!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_BARREL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 被打破后放出小鬼僵尸, 有时也会是其他僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pirate Captain僵尸 isn't actually a captain. His dry cleaning got mixed up with someone else's, but he thought he looked cool with an eye patch.  Plus, the parrot already knew his name, so he just went with it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的宠物鹦鹉可以飞出并偷走植物, 然后返回他身旁.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_PARROT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He's a third generation aviation revolutionary. He wants to serve his pirate brethren like his father and his grandmother, Salty Anne, before him.
从船长僵尸身旁快速飞出并抓走植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Keeping up with the latest pirate trends is always tricky, but remember, he was planking before it was cool.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的旗帜标志着一大波海盗僵尸即将到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Jolly Roger僵尸 and his flag are fused together into a single brain-munching unit. Their teamwork is an inspiration to ghouls everywhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: 海盗大动员僵尸标志着一大堆僵尸即将到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}使用鲨鱼砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受伤时射出海盗小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar Pirate likes short walks off the plank, moonlit raiding parties, and the smell of cannon fire. A true romantic.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 这只巨大的僵尸重新定义了鲨鱼袭击.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He was a bootblack, with a side trade as a pickpocket on the streets of London, but all he stole were oversized footwear. Time to steal some booty! was his catchphrase.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 喜欢紧凑的空间, 例如加农炮筒和滚桶.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Are the zombies becoming vegetarians? Do they even like eating plants? That's still a mystery of PvZ, but this guy will surely find and eat every plant he encounters! To him, the lawn is his all-you-can-eat buffet. Other zombies told him that he should try brains sometimes, but he was offended by that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 冲进战场并快速吃掉路上的一切-甚至包括地刺和暗影植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_PLATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}There are three things that he hates the most. One, losing his most prized possession - his grate. The poncho is there just to protect it from getting rusty. Two, losing his mechanical horse. Three, being compared with his brother. Seriously - he's not the one who eats plants like there's no tomorrow.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_PLATE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 有时候会携带一个壁炉.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PROSPECTOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}appears on the left side of the lawn after dynamite explodes

{FLAVOR}There once was a zombie who got old, spending all his days looking for gold.  'Til one day in the rain, he finally ate brains... and, wait, where's his other shoe?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PROSPECTOR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 引信爆炸后飞跃你的防线.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}太阳神僵尸 isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say Ra a lot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 尝试偷走你的阳光, 但只是好好保存.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SEAGULL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}海鸥僵尸 has racked up the frequent flier miles and dreams of going to the top colleges in the world on a cerebral gastronomy vacation.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SEAGULL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 可以在没有甲板的路上飞行, 忽略土豆地雷和冰冻生菜等低矮植物.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SWASHBUCKLER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}在海盗登船事件中会大量出现

{FLAVOR}He swashes. He buckles. But, he also writes home every third Sunday and sends brains and treasure via post. He's a good zombie at heart.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SWASHBUCKLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 荡着绳子并在你草坪的中间降落.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He dreams about playing fetch, running for the brains. He loves burying himself in the yard, and is not yet indoor trained. He's still looking for his tail.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 在你的草坪上扔出骨头并制造墓碑.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TREASUREYETI_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}速度: {STAT}一段时间后逃跑
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}带有宝藏

{FLAVOR}The rare and wondrous Yeti carries his lunch box up and down Mount Brainer to his isolated mountain lodge.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TREASUREYETI_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 一个罕见而好奇的僵尸, 喜欢打包午餐.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After a wild night, Conehead僵尸 woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 他的交通路障使他的血量是普通僵尸的三倍.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}There was a time when Buckethead僵尸 was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 他的桶给了他很好的保护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 砖头僵尸的砖头给了他砖头般的砖头防护.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}普通僵尸 hates the term Basic. He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A spelling impaired zombie named Brian, 旗帜僵尸 keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 他的旗帜标志着一大波僵尸即将到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Rally僵尸 splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.
大动员僵尸和他的旗帜标志着一大堆僵尸即将到来.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用电线杆砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到伤害时扔出小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar is the embodiment of power, made real. He is a juggernaut of hunger, from which there is no escape. He is fear unleashed. Well, he's fear slightly leashed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用交通标志砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到伤害时扔出路障头小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫击退

{FLAVOR}All the time spent on dumpster diving has finally paid off for him. Although he didn't find any brains, he did get a sweet new ride that still worked! Then he proceeded to rip it apart for an armor set anyway, because Zomboss already invented teleportation and who even drives anymore? Wait...
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_: 这个全副武装的巨人僵尸即将在你的草坪上制造混乱
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or zombadittude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后走向你的房子.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}When the Imp first met a Conehead僵尸, he discovered himself another whole controversial mystery of the universe.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 越过你的大部分防御, 然后走向你的房子.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VASE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用电线杆砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到伤害时扔出小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}会主动被甜菜护卫弹走

{FLAVOR}The ceramic confines of the Vase Gargantuar's home has done nothing to his endless hunger, his immense power, or his vast destructive potential. However, his footspeed could be better.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VASE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: 难以置信, 这种大小的僵尸可以被塞进罐子里.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULLRIDER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Had dreams of becoming a rodeo clown but found the clown make-up to just be too creepy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULLRIDER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 被投射到不够高大的植物后方, 然后步行前进.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}高坚果会阻挡小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}He's not an angry bull. He loves flowers, playing in the fields, sitting under trees, and long walks across the pasture. He wants to settle down when he meets the right cow. Too bad he's a robot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 可以投射小鬼越过你的大部分防御.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Legend perhaps overstates Rodeo Legend僵尸's status in the rodeo world. Don't tell him that, though, unless you're desperate to hear an hour-long tirade about calf-roping.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 传奇斗牛僵尸撞击植物, 并且投射小鬼越过你的大部分防御.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}mouth turbine can pull plants to it
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}summoned zombie sharks can consume plants

{FLAVOR}The Zombot Sharktronic Sub is a true labor of love. Dr. Zomboss obsessed over every detail of the aquatic mechanism of doom as he worked on it day in and day out from the wee hours of the morning until well after dark. He carefully handcrafted the shark's nearly impenetrable exterior skin. He shaved each razor-sharp tooth to a point by hand. And he painstakingly installed the lethal plant-consuming fan inside the machine's horrific maw all by himself. Zomboss shed more than one tear of joy when his masterpiece was complete. Say what you will about the evil genius, but he is passionate about his projects.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}missile attacks can target mine carts

{FLAVOR}Ranchers and farmhands abandon your fields. Rumbling down the dusty trail, this wagon was engineered to strike fear into the heart of any horticulturist who should encounter it. Dr. Zomboss normally doesn't take any bull, but this time he made an exception.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION_HE: The stagecoach of destruction from the western wilds.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DARK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Damage: {STAT}fire breathing attacks destroy plants
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}lobbed fireballs can hatch Imp Dragon僵尸

{FLAVOR}With a rumble of destruction, Dr. Zomboss forged his Dark Dragon in the heart of a volcano. Then he tempered the beast in the chilled waters of Doom Lake. Finally  he fed its furnace with coal from the Mines of Morbidity. And the paint job - that was done by Carl.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DARK_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: The desolator of all, from dark times.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DINO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}summons dinosaurs

{FLAVOR}With flagrant disregard for temporal tidiness and simple good taste, Dr. Zomboss figured it would be a good idea to build a big metal dinosaur.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DINO_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: A mechanical means of dinosaurian destruction.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EGYPT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}missile attack can create tombstones

{FLAVOR}To add that extra bit of wickedness to the Sphinx-inator Dr. Zomboss chiseled his creation from the stonework of cursed tombs. You should not take this instance of reuse and recycle to mean he's going green. The only thing green about him is his tongue.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EGYPT_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The destroyer of plants from the ancient sands.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}speakers do passive damage (except to ground plants and Phat Beet) and send out shockwave attacks

{FLAVOR}In another world, in another time, Dr. Zomboss would receive the bounty of enthusiastic applause that is his due. Not here and now, though. Nope.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION_: An intimate evening with some of Dr. Zomboss' most recent and painful explorations.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}missile attacks can destroy Power Tiles

{FLAVOR}When Dr. Zomboss is nestled into the comfy folds of his futuristic cerebral control pod he almost finds it hard to be evil. Of course once he sees a lawn full of happy plants that puts him right back where he needs to be, hungry and evil.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The Power Tile crushing creation from the Far Future.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dr. Zomboss was real impressed with himself when he came up with the idea to build a weaponized woolly mammoth with the power to blast snow and ice out of its mechanical trunk. But what Dr. Zomboss didn't realize until it was too late: He's allergic to mammoth fur. Now he has to load up on allergy medication every time he wants to take the darn thing out for a spin.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The mammoth mech with an ice blast from the past.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT} drops zombies and bags o' sand

{FLAVOR}After repeated failures with variously robotic engines of destruction, Dr. Zomboss decided to go with a kinder, more eco-friendly lighter-than-air option to sow disaster and discord.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION_: The floating fortress from the skies above.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}cannon can rain down imps past your defenses

{FLAVOR}Hoist the mizzenmast, batten down the hatches! 15 zombies on a dead man's boat, yo ho ho and a bucket of brains! Dr. Zomboss had to admit he was really getting into this whole pirate thing. Though he never thought he'd be on a boat on a boat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The plant plundering privateer of the high seas.
